name: lia_wk2
description:
... you just landed on a planet where you believe your friend is already settled in. find your way to your friend's pod following the floating sign 🟥 ... go beyond the mountains and travel through the valley ... what is that giant blue plant anyway??? 

use the mouse to look around, turn around and run with your keyboard WSAD. 

extra fun: try hitting the 🟥 !!! 

remaining problems: 

1. weird camera always head down at the beginning. 

2. only available for chrome but not safari. 

3. set specific color value to objects instead of using Color.blue .
